CustomField.formula: IF( Referral_Contact__c != null, Referral_Contact__r.Owner:User.FirstName +' '+ Referral_Contact__r.Owner:User.LastName, IF (Referral_Account__c != null, Referral_Account__r.Owner:User.FirstName +' '+ Referral_Account__r.Owner:User.LastName, "" ))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The name of the Sales Rep associated with the referral source
CustomField.label: Sales Rep Name
